title: WaveSpeed AI - Restore Old Photos with Advanced Technology

hero.heading: Restore Your Cherished Memories
hero.description: Transform your old, faded photos into vibrant, restored images with just a click.

prompt.heading: Upload Your Photo
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Restore a family portrait, enhance a landscape from your travels...

examples.heading: Before & After Restoration Examples
examples.description: Explore how our AI brings faded memories back to life with remarkable detail and clarity.

items.imageAlt: Example of a vibrant restored landscape

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Photo Restoration?
features.description: Harness our cutting-edge AI technology for stunning old photo revitalization.

items.title: Brilliant Restorations
items.description: Effortlessly restore colors, details, and clarity to any aged photograph.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: Simply upload your photo and watch as AI performs the restoration automatically.

items.title: Secure and Private
items.description: Your images remain private—processed locally without uploads to our servers.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Revitalize your photos in three clear steps

items.title: Upload Your Old Photo
items.description: Choose an old photograph by dragging it into our interface or browsing your files. JPG, PNG, and WebP formats are supported.

items.title: AI Restoration Magic
items.description: Our advanced AI analyzes and restores your photo, enhancing colors and fixing defects to bring it back to life.

items.title: Download Your Restored Image
items.description: Preview the restored photo and download it in high resolution, perfect for printing or sharing.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonial.description: Join countless users who have revived their treasured photographs with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Roberts
items.comment: I couldn't believe how quickly my old wedding photo was restored! It looks pristine again.

items.name: James Clark
items.comment: WaveSpeed breathed new life into my grandfather's cherished photos. A truly remarkable service.

items.name: Anna Lee
items.comment: The restoration process was seamless. I'm so pleased with how my childhood pictures turned out!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your queries about our photo restoration feature

items.title: What types of old photos can be restored?
items.description: Our AI can restore various types of old photos, including faded prints, damaged images, and colorized historical photographs, enhancing clarity and detail.

items.title: Is there a cost for using the restoration feature?
items.description: Yes! While we offer a limited number of free credits for initial restorations, users can purchase additional credits for extensive use or subscribe for regular access.

items.title: Can I use my restored images commercially?
items.description: Yes! Restored images can be used for both personal and commercial purposes, particularly for those on a subscription plan.

items.title: How secure is my photo during the restoration?
items.description: Your images are processed locally on your device to ensure maximum privacy. No images are stored or transmitted, ensuring your memories remain secure.

footer.heading: Ready to Restore Your Memories?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and breathe new life into your old photographs. No sign-up needed.
